TopicTitle: Someone is locking my real account

Articles.Content:
So if you haven't figured it out, my real account name is rpayne88. I've tried resetting my password and used the password I received in my email. However, after waiting almost an hour without attempting to log in, I am still locked out.

I'm just trying to get back into my real account.

Can you email [email protected], listing your email and IP address?

Thanks!
